languages.text: {n}Мрачная и торжественная процессия пастырей прибыла на борт, во всеуслышание отречась от прежней жизни. Беженцы, встревоженные потерей духовных лидеров, присмирели и впредь не шли наперекор порядкам, заведенным Орденом Молота.{/n}

{n}A grim and solemn procession of preachers came aboard and made a vocal renunciation of their former lives. Disturbed by the loss of their spiritual leaders, the refugees quieted down and no longer defied the Order of the Hammer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мрачная и торжественная процессия пастырей прибыла на борт, во всеуслышание отречась от прежней жизни. Беженцы, встревоженные потерей духовных лидеров, присмирели и впредь не шли наперекор порядкам, заведенным Орденом Молота.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A grim and solemn procession of shepherds came aboard and made a vocal renunciation of their former lives. Disturbed by the loss of their spiritual leaders, the refugees had quieted down and would no longer defy the order of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

{n}A grim and solemn procession of shepherds came aboard and made a vocal renunciation of their former lives. Disturbed by the loss of their spiritual leaders, the refugees had quieted down and would no longer defy the order of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

{n}A grim and solemn procession of shepherds came aboard and made a vocal renunciation of their former lives. Disturbed by the loss of their spiritual leaders, the refugees quieted down and no longer defied the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

{n}A grim and solemn procession of preachers came aboard and made a vocal renunciation of their former lives. Disturbed by the loss of their spiritual leaders, the refugees quieted down and no longer defied the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

{n}A grim and solemn procession of preachers came aboard and made a vocal renunciation of their former lives. Disturbed by the loss of their spiritual leaders, the refugees quieted down and no longer defied the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine grimmige und feierliche Prozession von Predigern kam an Bord und entsagten ihrem einstigen Leben. Durch den Verlust ihrer spirituellen Führer verunsichert, beruhigten sich die Flüchtlinge und boten dem Orden des Hammers nicht länger die Stirn.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A grim and solemn procession of preachers came aboard and made a vocal renunciation of their former lives. Disturbed by the loss of their spiritual leaders, the refugees quieted down and no longer defied the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine grimmige und feierliche Prozession von Predigern kam an Bord und entsagten ihrem einstigen Leben. Durch den Verlust ihrer spirituellen Führer verunsichert, beruhigten sich die Flüchtlinge und boten dem Orden des Hammers nicht länger die Stirn.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une procession de prêcheur aussi sinistre que solennelle a embarqué et désavoué publiquement sa vie passée. Ébranlés par la disparition de leurs guides spirituels, les réfugiés se sont calmés et ont cessé de défier l'Ordre du Marteau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A grim and solemn procession of preachers came aboard and made a vocal renunciation of their former lives. Disturbed by the loss of their spiritual leaders, the refugees quieted down and no longer defied the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une procession de prédicateurs aussi sinistre que solennelle a embarqué et désavoué publiquement sa vie passée. Ébranlés par la disparition de leurs guides spirituels, les réfugiés se sont calmés et ont cessé de défier l'Ordre du Marteau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una sombría y solemne procesión de predicadores subió a bordo y renunció de viva voz a sus anteriores vidas. Tras perder a sus líderes espirituales, los refugiados se detuvieron y dejaron de desafiar a la Orden del Martillo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A grim and solemn procession of preachers came aboard and made a vocal renunciation of their former lives. Disturbed by the loss of their spiritual leaders, the refugees quieted down and no longer defied the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sombría y solemne procesión de predicadores subió a bordo y renunció de viva voz a sus anteriores vidas. Tras perder a sus líderes espirituales, los refugiados se detuvieron y dejaron de desafiar a la Orden del Martillo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}悲壮かつ厳粛なプリーチャーの行列が乗船し、それまでの人生を声高に放棄した。精神的指導者を失った避難民たちは静まり返り、もはや鉄槌の修道会に逆らうことはなくなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A grim and solemn procession of preachers came aboard and made a vocal renunciation of their former lives. Disturbed by the loss of their spiritual leaders, the refugees quieted down and no longer defied the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}悲壮かつ厳粛なプリーチャーの行列が乗船し、それまでの人生を声高に放棄した。精神的指導者を失った避難民たちは静まり返り、もはや鉄槌の修道会に逆らうことはなくなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}一群阴沉、肃穆的牧师走上了船，公开宣称放弃了曾经的教义。难民们失去了精神领袖，也随即安静下来，不再敢违逆重锤修会。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A grim and solemn procession of preachers came aboard and made a vocal renunciation of their former lives. Disturbed by the loss of their spiritual leaders, the refugees quieted down and no longer defied the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一群阴沉、肃穆的牧师走上了船，公开宣称放弃了曾经的教义。难民们失去了精神领袖，也随即安静下来，不再敢违逆重锤修会。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Acımasız ve ciddi bir vaiz alayı, gemiye gelip sözlü bir şekilde eski yaşantılarından feragat ettiler. Ruhani liderlerini kaybetmekten rahatsız olan mülteciler sakinledi ve Çekiç Tarikatı'na karşı gelmeyi sonlandırdı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A grim and solemn procession of preachers came aboard and made a vocal renunciation of their former lives. Disturbed by the loss of their spiritual leaders, the refugees quieted down and no longer defied the Order of the Hammer.{/n}
